sense.def:
Z izrazom
prime
opišemo nekaj, kar je v določenih okoliščinah najpomembnejše.

seg.quote: What was said was of prime importance.
Maths is no longer a prime requirement for a career in accountancy.

sense.def:
Izraz
prime
uporabljamo tudi za stvari, ki so najboljše možne kakovosti.

seg.quote: He wants his herd delivered in prime condition.

sense.def:
Primer, ki je
prime
, je za nekaj značilen.

seg.quote: ...a prime example of the power of the press.

sense.def:
One's prime
je obdobje v človekovem življenju, ko je najbolj dejaven ali najbolj uspešen.

seg.quote: I had been a good player in my prime.

sense.def:
To prime someone about something
pomeni nekomu posredovati podatke o nečem, da bi bil bolje pripravljen za določeno dogajanje.

seg.quote: I had primed him for this meeting.
